book.title: The Motor Boys in the Army
book.description: 简介： Not since the old lumberyard burned, added Jerry Hopkins, as he walked down the street, one arm linked in that of Ned Slade on his left, and the other hooked up with Bob Bakers on his right. It doesnt seem possible that weve been drawn into this, aft...
